hero.info1: I can bring your enterprise software to the next level.

about.hello: Dominique Clijsters | Senior Software Engineer | Leader
about.info1: I have been developing software professionally for almost ten years. I have experience in customer care, consulting, project management and support. I regularly attend training courses and conferences and speak at the JUG Koblenz and the TECDay of 1&1 IONIS.
